panels.description: cls = ${cls}. Used as an unique cluster identifier and resource namespace.
panels.title: Cluster

panels.description: ins = ${ins}, used as unique instance identifier. Formed as {{ cls }}-{{ seq }}.
panels.title: Instance

panels.description: Users list that runs this query
panels.title: Users

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND queryid = '$query' ORDER BY calls DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND queryid = '$query' ORDER BY calls DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND queryid = '$query' ORDER BY calls DESC LIMIT 1;

panels.description: Pgbouncer Queries per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Pgbouncer query average response time in last 1m, 5m, 15m

targets.expr: increase(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[1m])
increase(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[5m])
increase(pg_query_exec_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m]) / increase(pg_query_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", query="$query"}[15m])

panels.title: RT

targets.rawSql:
SELECT queryid::TEXT AS qid, d.datname, r.rolname, s.*
FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements s
LEFT JOIN pg_database d ON s.dbid = d.oid
     LEFT JOIN pg_roles r ON s.userid = r.oid
WHERE datname = '$datname'
ORDER BY rows DESC LIMIT 200;

list.description: Prometheus datasource used by this dashboard
list.label: Source
list.name: ds

list.definition: SELECT distinct queryid::TEXT FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND userid != 10 LIMIT 1000;
list.label: Query
list.name: query
list.query: SELECT distinct queryid::TEXT FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND userid != 10 LIMIT 1000;

list.definition: SELECT query FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND queryid = '$query' LIMIT 1;
list.name: qs
list.query: SELECT query FROM monitor.pg_stat_statements WHERE dbid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_database WHERE datname = '${datname}') AND queryid = '$query' LIMIT 1;
